pages.text: Welcome to the new time cycle, where days and nights are longer. $(br2)Days now last 30 minutes and nights 20 minutes, giving you a full 50 minutes per day to explore the world.

$(l)Keep Phantoms at Bay$()$(br)Under the open sky, you're safe from mobs, as they won't spawn out in the open. Except for phantoms. Make sure to sleep once in a while to keep them at bay.$(br2)$(l)Pass the Time$() $(br)You can always sleep to pass the night. And if you ever want to skip a long day, make a hammock. $(br2)The Ritual of Moonlight from Ars Nouveau can be used to skip the day entirely.
